subject: Investing
title: Tax Benefits of Real Estate Investing
description: Learn Tax Benefits of Real Estate Investing in one minute.

hook.text: A landlord earned $30,000 in rental profit but paid zero federal income tax on it.

buildup.text: Depreciation lets you deduct the building's cost over 27.5 years, even if its value is rising.

discovery.text: Mortgage interest, repairs, insurance, and property management fees are all deductible expenses.

twist.text: Paper losses from depreciation can offset real rental income, creating tax-free cash flow.

climax.text: When you sell, depreciation recapture taxes part of those deductions backâ€”so plan the exit wisely.

punchline.text: Real estate is one of the few assets that pays you now and taxes you later.
